configurationBackup_subtitle:
You need an up-to-date Configuration Backup to recover your Accounts and Personas if you lose access to them.

Your Backup does not contain your keys or seed phrase.
configurationBackup_accountsSubtitle: Your list of Accounts and the Factors required to recover them
configurationBackup_personasSubtitle: Your list of Personas and the Factors required to recover them. Also your Persona data.
configurationBackup_securityFactorsSubti: The list of Security Factors you need to recover your Accounts and Personas.
configurationBackup_walletSettingsSubtit: Your general settings, such as trusted dApps, linked Connectors and wallet display settings.
configurationBackup_automatedBackupsWarn: Without an updated Configuration Backup, you cannot recover your Accounts and Personas.
configurationBackup_manualBackup_subtitl: You can export your own Configuration Backup file and save it locally
configurationBackup_manualBackup_warning: Youâ€™ll need to export a new Backup file each time you make a change in your wallet.
configurationBackup_problem5WarningIOS: Automated Configuration Backup not working. Check internet connection and iCloud settings.
configurationBackup_problem5WarningAndro: Automated Configuration Backup not working. Check internet connection and Google Drive settings.
configurationBackup_problem6Warning: To secure your wallet, turn on automated backups or manually export backup file.
configurationBackup_problem7Warning: Configuration Backup not up to date. Turn on automated backups or manually export backup file.
configurationBackup_problem7OutOfDateBac: Out-of-date backup still present on iCloud
